name: Othello
body:
### Grand Prix d'Othello
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here [using GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/), select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new `gh-pages` branch locally. If you’re using GitHub Desktop, simply sync your repository and you’ll see the new branch.

## Rules
* Choose a name for your team with care
* Clone this git repository with `git clone https://github.com/davstromb/othello.git`
* Create your own branch with `git checkout –b <the name of your team>`
* Create a new Java class in package `src/agent/agents` and make sure that your class extends the abstract class _Agent_
* Don't create any other files than `<the name of your team>.java`

## Hints
* Each turn is timed to two seconds, unused time is saved for the next turn
* If your agent throws an exception or if you're not able to return a valid move on time, a random move is choosen for you and all saved time is cleared.
* Several implemented agents can be found in package `src/agent/agents` that you can use for inspiration
* The method `newGame` is called in the beginning of each game.
* The method `nextMove` is called when it is your turn

## Score
* Win = 3p
* Draw = 1p
* Loss = 0p
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
